name: Wayblaze
description:
NOTE: Game is going to be published on mobile, so demo above is just a demo. It won't work on mobile devices, so please head to the App or Play store once it's been uploaded there!

Hello there! I've been working on this project for a little over a year now, mostly in the content generation stage now.

It's a real-time strategy RPG coming to Android and iOS. If you tried the demo above, please leave a comment to let me know your thoughts!

Controls:

  • Tap twice on the squares with arrows to change areas.
  • Drag unit (or tap on unit and somewhere else) to move.
  • Attack by moving near enemies.
  • Attacks can be dodged.

Credits:

Background music grabbed from PØDRAY in his reddit thread.
